name: PURRGATORY (itch)
description:
[go fullscreen for best experience]

use arrows/WASD to walk around! dig up some treasure on the beach! go to hell??

made in a weekend for Mini Jam 108: Seaside. special care was given to include the limitation "everything dies in one hit". #bigweedbongs
